external_games.name: Whispers In The West - Two Bad Sisters -ENGLISH

name: Whispers in the West: Two Bad Sisters
summary: From the writer of “Overboard!”, Jon Ingold - Miss Sara Estelle has arrived in Brimstone, and she needs your help tracking down a valuable possession left in the care of the priest. There’s only one problem: the priest swears she already came and collected it herself!
